subject: Inquiry About Delivery Status for My Simsonn Plus X Racing Pedals Order #SSN4059
description_text:
Hello Team,

My name is Dobre Alexandru Ionut. I have an active order for a pair of
Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedals to be delivered to:


*Brahmstraße 2 47533 Kleve, Germany*

I wanted to kindly ask if there is any chance the pedals could arrive
by *Saturday
evening*. I chose express delivery because I have a race on Sunday and
would really like to use them.

Thank you very much for your help.
Wishing you all the best.

Kind regards,
*Dobre Alexandru Ionut*

conversations.body_text: Hi Dobre Alexandru Ionut,    We apologize that the package is now expected to arrive on the 10th. Due to recent capacity constraints with our logistics provider, there has been a delay. Additionally, our German warehouse is currently out of stock. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047100352519

Thank you !
No problem, have a wonderful weekend !!

On Fri 5. Dec 2025 at 09:39, service@simsonn.com

Hello guys,

I have seen that the package has arrived in Liege yesterday but i was not
able to receive any kind of tracking id for it, i was checking the one that
you told me but i dint see any further updates, is it still the same ?
Should be another company deliverying it considering is in Europe ?

Thank you, wish you a wonderful week.

Dear Simsonn Support Team,

I hope you are doing well.

I am writing to kindly request an update regarding my recent order, which I
placed with the 3–5 business day delivery option. I truly appreciate your
previous response and apology, and I fully understand that delays can
happen, especially with international shipments.According to the tracking
information, the package arrived in Europe (Belgium, Liège) earlier this
week, but since then there have been no further updates. As it has now been
over eight business days, I wanted to check in with you to see if there is
any additional information available about the current status of the
shipment or the expected delivery timeframe.I am not in a rush or trying to
create any pressure; I would simply appreciate any clarification you can
provide so I know what to expect next.

Thank you very much for your help and for your continued support. I look
forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards
